resources.string: Please configure your serial port first.
You do not have read/write permission to the serial port.
The serial port can not be opened for an unknown reason.
Above is a video generated while the eye was being tested. Use this for diagnostics purposes.

Welcome to OpenSight, a mobile application for eye diagnostics. Please select the test you would like to perform. Visual Test allows access to the LED and the eye camera, allowing videotaping of the eye exam. The Eye Chart tests is your standard vision test, and will be used to diagnose refractive errors.
